verses.verse: In the third <WH7969> year <WH8141> of the reign <WH4438> of king <WH4428> Belshazzar <WH1113> a vision <WH2377> appeared <WH7200> to me, even to me Daniel, <WH1840> after <WH310> that which appeared <WH7200> to me at the first. <WH8462>

And I saw <WH7200> in a vision; <WH2377> and it came <WH1961> to pass, when I saw, <WH7200> that I was at Shushan <WH7800> in the palace, <WH1002> which <WH834> is in the province <WH4082> of Elam; <WH5867> and I saw <WH7200> in a vision, <WH2377> and I was by the river <WH180> of Ulai. <WH195>

Then I lifted <WH5375> up my eyes, <WH5869> and saw, <WH7200> and, behold, <WH2009> there stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> the river <WH180> a ram <WH352> which had two horns: <WH7161> and the two horns <WH7161> were high; <WH1364> but one <WH259> was higher <WH1364> than <WH4480> the other, <WH8145> and the higher <WH1364> came <WH5927> up last. <WH314>

I saw <WH7200> the ram <WH352> pushing <WH5055> westward, <WH3220> and northward, <WH6828> and southward; <WH5045> so that no <WH3808> beasts <WH2416> might stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> him, neither <WH369> was there any that could deliver <WH5337> out of his hand; <WH3027> but he did <WH6213> according to his will, <WH7522> and became <WH1431> great. <WH1431>

And as I was considering, <WH995> behold, <WH2009> an he goat <WH5795> came <WH935> from the west <WH4628> on the face <WH6440> of the whole <WH3605> earth, <WH776> and touched <WH5060> not the ground: <WH776> and the goat <WH6842> had a notable <WH2380> horn <WH7161> between <WH996> his eyes. <WH5869>

And he came <WH935> to the ram <WH352> that had two horns, <WH7161> which <WH834> I had seen <WH7200> standing <WH5975> before <WH6440> the river, <WH180> and ran <WH7323> to him in the fury <WH2534> of his power. <WH3581>

And I saw <WH7200> him come <WH5060> close <WH681> to the ram, <WH352> and he was moved with choler <WH4843> against <WH413> him, and smote <WH5221> the ram, <WH352> and broke <WH7665> his two <WH8147> horns: <WH7161> and there was no <WH3808> power <WH3581> in the ram <WH352> to stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> him, but he cast <WH7993> him down to the ground, <WH776> and stamped <WH7429> on him: and there was none <WH3808> that could deliver <WH5337> the ram <WH352> out of his hand. <WH3027>

Therefore the he goat <WH6842> waxed very <WH5704> <WH3960> great: <WH1431> and when he was strong, <WH6105> the great <WH1419> horn <WH7161> was broken; <WH7665> and for it came <WH5927> up four <WH702> notable <WH2380> ones toward the four <WH702> winds <WH7307> of heaven. <WH8064>

And out of one <WH259> of them came <WH3318> forth <WH3318> a little <WH4704> horn, <WH7161> which waxed exceeding <WH3499> great, <WH1431> toward <WH413> the south, <WH5045> and toward <WH413> the east, <WH4217> and toward <WH413> the pleasant <WH6643> land.

And it waxed great, <WH1431> even to the host <WH6635> of heaven; <WH8064> and it cast <WH5307> down <WH5307> some of the host <WH6635> and of the stars <WH3556> to the ground, <WH776> and stamped <WH7429> on them.

Yes, he magnified <WH1431> himself even to the prince <WH8269> of the host, <WH6635> and by him the daily <WH8548> sacrifice was taken <WH7311> away, <WH7311> and the place <WH4349> of the sanctuary <WH4720> was cast <WH7993> down.

And an host <WH6635> was given <WH5414> him against <WH5921> the daily <WH8548> sacrifice by reason of transgression, <WH6588> and it cast <WH7993> down the truth <WH571> to the ground; <WH776> and it practiced, <WH6213> and prospered. <WH6743>

Then I heard <WH8085> one <WH259> saint <WH6918> speaking, <WH1696> and another <WH259> saint <WH6918> said <WH559> to that certain <WH6422> saint which spoke, <WH1696> How <WH5704> long <WH5704> shall be the vision <WH2377> concerning the daily <WH8548> sacrifice, and the transgression <WH6588> of desolation, <WH8074> to give <WH5414> both the sanctuary <WH6944> and the host <WH6635> to be trodden <WH4823> under foot? <WH4823>
And he said <WH559> to me, To two thousand <WH505> and three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> days; <WH6153> <WH1242> then shall the sanctuary <WH6944> be cleansed. <WH6663>

And it came <WH1961> to pass, when I, even I Daniel, <WH1840> had seen <WH7200> the vision, <WH2377> and sought <WH1245> for the meaning, <WH998> then, behold, <WH2009> there stood <WH5975> before <WH5048> me as the appearance <WH4758> of a man. <WH1397>

And I heard <WH8085> a man's <WH120> voice <WH6963> between <WH996> the banks of Ulai, <WH195> which called, <WH7121> and said, <WH559> Gabriel, <WH1403> make this <WH1975> man to understand <WH995> the vision. <WH4758>

So he came <WH935> near <WH681> where I stood: <WH5977> and when he came, <WH935> I was afraid, <WH1204> and fell <WH5307> on my face: <WH6440> but he said <WH559> to me, Understand, <WH995> O son <WH1121> of man: <WH120> for at the time <WH6256> of the end <WH7093> shall be the vision. <WH4758>

Now as he was speaking <WH1696> with me, I was in a deep <WH7290> sleep <WH7290> on <WH5921> my face <WH6440> toward the ground: <WH776> but he touched <WH5060> me, and set <WH5975> me upright. <WH5977>

And he said, <WH559> Behold, <WH2005> I will make you know <WH3045> what <WH853> <WH834> shall be in the last <WH319> end of the indignation: <WH2195> for at the time appointed <WH4150> the end <WH7093> shall be.
The ram <WH352> which <WH834> you saw <WH7200> having <WH1167> two horns <WH7161> are the kings <WH4428> of Media <WH4074> and Persia. <WH6539>
And the rough <WH8163> goat <WH6842> is the king <WH4428> of Grecia: <WH3120> and the great <WH1419> horn <WH7161> that is between <WH996> his eyes <WH5869> is the first <WH7223> king. <WH4428>
Now that being broken, <WH7665> whereas four <WH702> stood <WH5975> up for it, four <WH702> kingdoms <WH4438> shall stand <WH5975> up out of the nation, <WH1471> but not in his power. <WH3581>

And in the latter <WH319> time of their kingdom, <WH4438> when the transgressors <WH6586> are come to the full, <WH8552> a king <WH4428> of fierce <WH5794> countenance, <WH6440> and understanding <WH995> dark <WH2420> sentences, <WH2420> shall stand <WH5975> up.

And his power <WH3581> shall be mighty, <WH6105> but not by his own power: <WH3581> and he shall destroy <WH7843> wonderfully, <WH6381> and shall prosper, <WH6743> and practice, <WH6213> and shall destroy <WH7843> the mighty <WH6099> and the holy <WH6918> people. <WH5971>

And through <WH5921> his policy <WH7922> also he shall cause craft <WH4820> to prosper <WH6743> in his hand; <WH3027> and he shall magnify <WH1431> himself in his heart, <WH3824> and by peace <WH7962> shall destroy <WH7843> many: <WH7227> he shall also stand <WH5975> up against <WH5921> the Prince <WH8269> of princes; <WH8269> but he shall be broken <WH7665> without <WH657> hand. <WH3027>

And the vision <WH4758> of the evening <WH6153> and the morning <WH1242> which <WH834> was told <WH560> is true: <WH571> why shut <WH5640> you up the vision; <WH2377> for it shall be for many <WH7227> days. <WH3117>

And I Daniel <WH1840> fainted, <WH1961> and was sick <WH2470> certain days; <WH3117> afterward I rose <WH6965> up, and did <WH6213> the king's <WH4428> business; <WH4399> and I was astonished <WH8074> at <WH5921> the vision, <WH4758> but none <WH369> understood <WH995> it.
